scenes.text:
These are many of the clubs present in the Athletics Union. We have many more not here today, so you can look through the full list on our SU page. There's something for everyone to get you out there!

Many of the societies mention an 'AU' or Athletics Union Membership, and more information on that is below, along with other types of memberships.

Our AU Membership is a one time fee to join any club in the Athletics Union. Clubs will charge their own membership cost, but to join the groups the AU membership must be purchased, but only once no matter how many clubs you join. 
It is available from september.

The AU membership is £40 for a Tier 1 club, and £20 for a Tier 2, if you join a Tier 2 club but then want to join a Tier 1, don't worry, you only pay the difference. It will automatically be added to your first club membership purchase.

Some clubs will have social memberships, which are as described, they enable you to go to the social events of the club, but not the sports or fixture events. 

An Erasmus membership is regarding international students, and any club offering an erasmus specific membership will have their own details regarding it.

An IMG membership is for 'Intra Mural Games' which is a recreational and competitive sports league for students and staff at the uni, you can create your own team with some friends and enter into a league.
